page.title: 09KEMBLE SCHOOL
page.content: {Kemble School} was opened in 1873. The first child to attend was Ellen Beames. The Logbooks and Admission Registers date back to the opening of the school. The original building had 3 classrooms and the School House. Today, the house is part of the school and 2 additional classrooms have been built. There have been 5 Headmasters and 5 Headmistresses of{Kemble School. Most children who attend{Kemble School come from{Kemble, Poole Keynes, Ewen, {Kemble Wick}and{Smerrill.}The ages of the children range from 4 - 11 years old. After 11 they have to go to Comprehensive school in Cirencester. Our day starts at 9 a.m. Then at midday we have our dinner and at 3.30 we go home. At present, there are 54 children in {Kemble School.}
